attributes.action: Nato support for the Kurdish defence of Iraqi territory
attributes.additional_details: The recent fall of Mosul and Tikrit have demonstrated the fragility of a war torn landscape that the permanent members of the UN security council must take direct responsibility for. Failure to react would have massive ramification for the citizens of iraq and neighbouring countries, just as was seen after the first Gulf war and would imminently threaten any progress achieved in Afghanistan. We owe this response to every man, woman and child who lost their lives attempting to deliver democracy in this most fragile of territories.
